meanings.sent1: The sounder of boars roamed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a sounder of boars while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The sounder of boars seemed to be having a family picnic.
meanings.sent4: The sounder of boars moved like a synchronized dance troupe.
meanings.sent5: The sounder of boars grunted happily as they foraged for food.

meanings.sent1: The new bridge was much sounder than the old one.
meanings.sent2: Her argument was sounder after she presented more evidence.
meanings.sent3: The sounder wall kept the noise out better than the thin one.
meanings.sent4: His plan was sounder than hers, with a stronger foundation.
meanings.sent5: The sounder structure withstood the storm without any damage.

meanings.definition: A device for making sound signals.
meanings.sent1: The ship's sounder alerted the crew of the approaching iceberg.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the sounder to send out a distress signal.
meanings.sent3: The sounder beeped loudly, startling the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The sounder crackled to life, announcing the arrival of the train.
meanings.sent5: The sounder emitted a high-pitched tone to indicate a problem.
